title: Caramel crunch toffee apples
ingredients: ['6 dessert apples', '6 wooden sticks', '400g dairy toffees, unwrapped', '2 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (250g) packet Lotus Caramelised Biscuits, roughly crushed', '125g milk chocolate, chopped', '125g white chocolate, chopped']
